runs.comm: four straightaway, short of a length outside off, hangs his bat out, edges it well wide of second slip for a boundary wide of third man
punished, back of a length outside off, bowled at 144.8 kmph, crashed through the covers for a boundary
back of a length outside off and moving away, left alone by Haddin
good pace, around 140.6 kmph, full and wide, swinging away, Haddin made room to smash that over the covers, missed
kept a little low, slightly short and zipped under his bat as he tried to play at it
fullish outside off and moving away, drove at it, got a thick edge down to third man for a single
gets it to move away, short of a good length outside off, pushed at it off the back foot, missed
on middle and off, gets forward and defends it wide of midwicket, calls for a single but then decides against it
good length outside off, gets half-forward and pushes it firmly through the gap between point and cover
fullish on the off stump, punched straight to cover
wayward delivery, too wide, but its also a no-ball, so freehit time
length ball but he failed to dispatch it, swung hard but mistimed it to mid-on and salvaged a single
probing him outside off, gets forward, goes hard at it, mistimes it but manages to slice it over cover and point for a couple more
angling into the pads, pretty quick, 141.2 kmph, tried to clip it fine, was struck on the pads
straying on the pads, flicked away behind square, wide of fine leg for a couple
too straight, good length on middle, they end up running four after he whips it away into the big gap between mid-on and midwicket, it's a big ground and they've just about made it on the fourth run
quickest ball of the game dismissed for a boundary, banged in short on middle at 145.6 kmph, gets forward and pulls it away over midwicket
down the leg side, wide, no it's worse, he's also overstepped, freehit coming
Aleem Dar escapes a snorter, low full toss drilled past the bowler but crashes into the stumps at the non-striker's end, Watson will be disappointed, Dar will breathe easy
good length outside off, makes room to bludgeon it through the covers, misses out
straight on leg stump, flicked away wide of Shoaib at fine leg for a quick couple
slower one punished, bowled at 107.2 kmph, short outside off and he drags it wide of midwicket, Rajasthan Royals team-mates these two but no mercy from the Australian
smashes him again, banged in short on the off and he smacks that between mid-on and midwicket for four more
atrocious bowling, three in a row, short on middle this time, pulled away wide of square leg this time, Australia are cruising here
back of a length, outside the off stump this time, chopped down to third man
opens the face and plays it to point, end of a highly productive over
looked out but did he get an inside edge? Full on middle and leg, tried to force it through the leg side, is hit on the pads but replays showed he nicked it
bouncer outside off, backs away from it
good length outside off, driven on the up to cover
shy at the non-striker's end and just misses, would have been close, pushed away wide of point and sets off, was stretching and a direct hit would have had him
moving back in, pushed away wide of mid-on for a quick single
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, was late to pick it, adjusted well to push it towards mid-off for a single
short of a good length outside off, guided down to third man for a single
short on the off, dragged wide of midwicket for a single
fullish on the off, punched between cover and mid-off for a single, a direct hit from Afridi at the non-striker's end, a wasted throw, and they take one more on the ricochet
low full toss on the off, punched wide of Afridi again for a quick single
nicely placed, half-volley and he squeezes it between cover and cover-point for three more
poor throw, pushed wide of midwicket and sets off, a horrendous throw at the non-striker's end and they complete a single
tossed up outside off, swept wide of square leg for a single
short of a length outside off, makes room to cut, misses
picked the doosra, tossed up on the off, slogged away wide of long-on for a boundary
flighted on middle, comes down the track and flicks it away wide of deep square leg for two more
wicket first ball, no doubt about this one, went on straight, Hopes went for the slog-sweep, missed, and was struck in line with leg stump on the back leg

gone first ball and he's on a hatrick! Straighter one again,  holding its line, bowled on middle, he's half-forward and just dabs at it playing for the spin, misses and is struck dead in front of middle
on leg stump, rapped on the pads but that was drifting down
pushed off the front foot to cover
poor ball, should have been dealt with but missed out, went for a mighty pull over midwicket, mistimed it, end of a double-wicket maiden
tossed up on middle, driven uppishly wide of the bowler to long-on
back of a length on the off, punched to long-on off the back foot
went on straight, pushed back off the front foot to Malik
tossed up, came down and bunted it down to long-on
gets out of the crease to push it into the off side, misses and Akmal clips off the bails but he's dragged his foot back in time
turned away awkwardly into the leg side behind square, brushed his pads
gave it some air, got to the pitch and chipped it wide of long-off for a couple
straighter one on leg stump, hit high on the pads
chopped it on!! Pakistan are on top, gave it some air, landed short, drifted into the batsman, went for the cut, got an inside edge straight onto the stumps, Afridi has three!
went through him, spun away just a touch and he pushed at it expecting it to turn more, was bamboozled
turned away into the leg side in front of square for a single
short of a length outside off, nudged wide of short-third for a quick single
short of a length on the off, whipped away to deep midwicket
kept a little low, slightly short on the off, turns it away to deep square leg
Five down, slightly quicker through the air, bowled on middle, charged down the track to clear long-off, the bat turned in his hand as he went for it and ended miscuing it straight to Gul at long-on

Afridi almost pulled off another one there, the throw from extra-cover is wayward, hurls it well wide of the keeper and Marcus North who responded to a single was a gonner if that was even near accurate
thrown up on leg side, turned wide of square leg
got an under edge over the keeper wide of short third for a couple
on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
the googly, produced the leading edge, kept it down as he tried to close the face
on middle and off, reverse-swept gently wide of short third
flighted on middle and leg, pushed through the line wide of midwicket
pushed him back with the short one, whipped away to deep square leg
an attempted googly on the off, punched down to long-off
flighted on the off stump, driven firmly but straight to long-off, just  a single
gets under a flighted one and chips it towards long-off
full and wide, sliced away to deep cover
missed a straight one, expected it to spin in and pushed at it hard, beat the outside edge but Akmal was quick with his hands, taking off the bails with Ferguson's foot still in the air
flighted on middle, pushed down the ground
spun in sharply to catch him on the pads but he was outside the line, end of another successful over
on middle and leg, worked away to deep midwicket

appeal for a stumping, tossed up outside off, missed the sweep as it spun away, he had stepped out of the crease and replays indicate that only a tiny part of his foot was behind the line when the bails were dislodged. Extremely close, but he wins the benefit of the doubt
flighted outside off, opens the face to guide that between short third and point
almost chopped it on, too close to cut, got an under edge just wide of the off stump and over the keeper
round the wicket, fullish on middle, swept away to deep square leg
on middle and leg, driven wide of Afridi at midwicket for a quick single
bouncer banged in outside leg, gets a run by way of a wide
kept low and moved away, pushed at it inside the line, missed, dot ball
full outside off, drove at it, got an inside edge onto his pads, thought of a single but was sent back
gone! Back of a length outside off, opened the face and sliced it straight to Shoaib Malik at point, the slide continues
beaten straightaway, short of a good length outside off and swung away to beat the outside edge as he fished for it away from his body
back of a length on the off, punched back to the bowler
an inswinger, in the slot on middle and he failed to get his bat down in time, drove at it but it was too quick, middle and leg take a beating
bowled on a good length on middle and leg, worked away behind square
tossed up on the off, dropped short of point, raced for a single and for the umpteenth time, they fail to get a direct hit
drifting into the pads, driven down the ground to long-on
quicker one bowled full on the off, defended to cover
spinning into the right hander, pushed away to midwicket
the straighter one, bowled on a good length outside off, tried to punch it off the back foot, missed it as he played inside the line
back of a length on the off, defended to mid-off
bouncer on leg stump, fails to get hold of it, gloves it while attempting a hook and gets a single short of square leg
back of a length outside off, swung away as he prodded at it to beat the outside edge
swinging into middle and leg, presents the full face to push it towards mid-off for a quick single
attempted yorker, low full toss on leg stump, bowled at 140.5 kmph, turned away to midwicket
went after it, the bottom hand came off as he lofted it wide of long-on, but only for a single to keep the strike
goes for the sweep and is rapped on the pads but that pitched outside leg
poor ball, bowled short outside leg stump, helps it on its way to the vacant fine-leg boundary
short of a good length on the off, worked away behind square for a single
tossed up outside off, landed on a good length, went for a swat over the bowler's head, missed
appeal for lbw, on leg stump and spinning away, tried to defend it with a straight bat but was beaten by the turn, struck the back pad but maybe a touch too high
timber!! Straight on middle, had some movement on it as well, North was into the shot a little too early as he tried to hoick that over midwicket, missed, and the stumps were pegged back
swinging in again, dug it out back to the bowler, just got his bat down
slower one bowled short of a length outside off, was totally beaten by the pace, it cut away to escape the bat
cut away again, just went through with an ugly drive away from his body, predictably missed it
how did that miss? Got some reverse on that, zipped through the gate to just evade leg stump, Hilfy is flummoxed
good length outside off, makes room and slices it over point for a couple
flighted outside off, tries to slog it over midwicket, misses the off stump by a whisker
bunts it along the ground to deep square leg
almost done in by the doosra, was beaten but got back into his crease in time
tossed up outside off, had a massive swipe at it, missed out, failed to read the straighter one
stopped on him a little, tried to turn it away into the leg side, mistimed it to lob it straight to Afridi on the circle at midwicket
